email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 04/04/2001 11:33 AM --------------------------- "Zerilli, Frank" <fzerilli@POWERMERCHANTS.COM> on 04/04/2001 11:09:21 AM To: "'jarnold@enron.com'" <jarnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: Transcanada Trade... Just to confirm this trade: Enron buys futures and sells LD swaps in the following months. EFP posting price is NYMEX settlement price on 4/30/01. Jul '01-176 lots Aug'01-157 lots Sep'01-443 lots Nov'01-132 lots Jan'02-233 lots Feb'02-283 lots Mar'02-607 lots Counter Party is Transcanada and they are posting with Man South. Thanks again..
